note: I'm a late-50s geek born in SoCal, raised in OK, lived in NYC & Las Cruces, NM. I'm currently in a Seattle suburb. I run computers for a part of GE but have been an editor at a NYC magazine, run a comic book store, a webmaster, & a film and video professional. When not "working" I do video production, photography, writing, reading, tabletop & video gaming (Runescape). I follow progressive politics, support LGBT+ issues, reproductive rights, etc. I am a Unitarian Universalist of over 20 years.
